desc.p: Represents id of MD.CLAUSES. Id can be used in MD application and description is automatically populated in the deal. It accepts alpha numerical characters.
Records created for customer specific clauses, to have ID beginning with the customer ID followed by the alpha numeric text.
Records with IDs beginning with the customer ID will be displayed in CIB.
The total number of characters of the ID must not exceed 16.
Any number of records can be created for a customer.
Contains the full clause text which is used in the construction of MD Advices/Documents generated as a result of MD transactions.
Contains a short meaningful description of the MD.CLAUSES narrative for enrichment purposes.
Free format text that is descriptive of the full clause text.
